name: Survival (itch) (TwinsRock88)
description:
Game Info:

This is a very basic prototype of a top down shooter. This Game is a wave based games with three different gun types. There are three different Mines in the game.  In total there is about 9 waves ending with the final Boss at wave 10.  I hope you enjoy my game!

Read Please

This is a very basic prototype of my 2nd game. This game is by all means not done or close to done. I request that you can give me some feed back on what things I should fix up or work on.  Every asset seen on in the game is not made of designed by me. Thank you!
